fr.cactuscata.pcmevent.utils.custominventory

Class CustomPlayerInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.PlayerInventory
      • fr.cactuscata.pcmevent.utils.custominventory.CustomPlayerInventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.IInventory, net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.INamableTileEntity

    public final class CustomPlayerInventory
extends net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.PlayerInventory

    Cette classe est utilisé pour faire fonctionner la commande /openinv (OpenInvCmd).

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Version:
    2.4.1
    Author:
    CactusCata
    See Also:
    OpenInvCmd
